page.title: 09Children's Recollections:
page.content: {May 18th 1985.}We set off from school at 6.00am and arrived at 10.02 at Hartland Point.We walked into a large field where we saw a fuel tanker and two people sitting in chairs.There was a rope all around the tanker. We carried our luggage to where the people were sitting.They told us to keep well back.The lady showed us how to use the life jackets. When the helicopter landed she called someone to sit in the front and then three others went in the back.We went straight up in the air and over the rocks,gradually we got further over the sea and Lundy came in sight. The pilot was looking around at all these instruments. At first I saw the S.W.Point of the island,Rat Island came in sight,then Mouse Island,Black Rock and Shutter Point.Finally.... (continued)
